viewData.name: PhiLaser Safety Glasses
viewData.short_description: Highly protective safety glasses designed to protect eyes against the powerful laser beam, ensuring the treatment is performed with precision and ultimate security.
viewData.long_description: The glasses offer full protection from laser light without affecting the visibility or comfort of the technician, making sure the treatment is performed effortless with ultimate control. Easy to store and clean, extremely durable and comfortable.
